text: Scyllaeidae is a taxonomic family of sea slugs, nudibranchs, marine gastropod mollusks in the superfamily Tritonioidea.Bouchet, P. (2012). Scyllaeidae. Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species at http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=23115 on 2012-06-07 This family is within the clade Cladobranchia (according to the taxonomy of the Gastropoda by Bouchet & Rocroi, 2005). == Taxonomy == The family Scyllaeidae consists of the following subfamilies (according to the taxonomy of the Gastropoda by Bouchet & Rocroi, 2005): ==Genera == Genera in the family Scyllaeidae include: *Crosslandia Eliot, 1902 **Crosslandia daedali Poorman & Mulliner, 1981 **Crosslandia viridis Eliot, 1903 *Notobryon Odhner, 1936 *Scyllaea Linnaeus, 1758 ;Genera brought into synonymy: * Nerea Lesson, 1831: synonym of Scyllaea Linnaeus, 1758 ==References== *http://www.catalogueoflife.org/ accessed 16 September 2009 *http://www.seaslugforum.net/ accessed 16 September 2009 * Vaught, K.C. (1989). A classification of the living Mollusca. American Malacologists: Melbourne, FL (USA). . XII, 195 pp. * Pola M., Camacho-Garcia Y.E. & Gosliner T.M. (2012) Molecular data illuminate cryptic nudibranch species: the evolution of the Scyllaeidae (Nudibranchia: Dendronotina) with a revision of Notobryon. Zoological Journal of the Linnean Society 165: 311–336 == External links ==
title: Scyllaeidae
